description: The FSM Education Sector Strategic Development Plan 2020–2024 has been prepared with funding support from the Global Partnership for Education specific to the needs of the people of FSM. The ESSDP is aligned with: 1| The Pacific Regional Education Framework (sub-titled ‘Moving Towards Education 2030’) and 2| The Sustainable Development Goals, specifically Goal 4 for Education.
name: Education Sector Strategic Development Plan 2020-2024
